column1: {{discussion top|'''No consensus'''. This has been open for almost four months and has only attracted one comment. --[[User:Jakec|Jakob]] ([[user talk:Jakec|talk]]) 22:38, 25 March 2014 (UTC)

:'''Keep''' For small airports there are not too many to maintain. Even for big airports, which have hundreds of destinations, these don't change that often. Useful for wikivoyage. [[User:Filceolaire|Filceolaire]] ([[User talk:Filceolaire|{{int:Talkpagelinktext}}]]) 10:38, 21 January 2014 (UTC)
